ygData.subject: RE: Guk Raid on National Day
ygData.msgSnippet: Extract from EQ lizer Journeyman Boots The journeyman boots are found on Drelzna at Najena.  They are one of the most useful magic items in the game. While the
ygData.messageBody:
Extract from EQ'lizer
Journeyman Boots
The journeyman boots are found on Drelzna at Najena. They are one of the
most useful magic items in the game. While the boots have low armor class
you will not be wearing them anyway. "These are a charge item." When you
right click the journeyman boots you will begin to run at great speeds(not
quite as fast as a player with Spirit of the Wolf cast on them, but fast
enough). These boots will greatly reduce your travel time and can also be
used to escape from hairy outdoor situations.
Notice the sentence "These are a charge item."
Ziltus


On Thursday, 05 August, 1999 2:14 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> well... the thing about JBOOTs is that it gives something like SOW but
> slightly less 2/3 of it i heard... and it got unlimied charges... so its
> permanent effect... and bcos necros use DOT and only DOT for killing...
with
> the help of JBOOTs... we can kite things easily... if u wonder how many
> necros managed to do kiting to kill a SG... thats how... hehee.. thast y
its
> the most impt thing on my list... BUT the bad thing bout it is that its
NO
> DROP and NO TRADE... so i have to be there to loot the thing...
>
> yes INT items are useful to me as well... but they will be of lower
priority
> as compared to JBOOTs... although the outlook of the character is
important
> (FBR n stuff)... hehee...
> as far as other attributes are concern... i think they do play a part...
at
> this point i might wanna ask u if u wanna restart... hehee... i know its
a
> pain... but its good to have ya dream char... n its still not too late
for u
> to restart... i know that WIZ use STA and INT as their main... having
heard
> that high STA actually helps u to regain mana faster... dunno how true...
n
> if they r the main things... they will play a part in ya char... i
suppose
> its the spells that relies on them or something... so i gave 100 DEX and
120
> INT to my necro... and so far im still quite happy with it...
>
> just what i thought...
> Nicademous
